main.name: Emmanuel Sogelola
description: I'm currently a student at Georgebrown College studying Computer Programming.
Proficient in Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, C++, C# and Python.
Occasionally developing games and web apps using various frameworks.

skills: Specialized understanding of Java and a high proficiency in other languages such as C++, C# and Python.
Developed web applications using Django, ASP.Net, Spring, React, Ionic, NodeJS and PHP Frameworks such as Laravel and CodeIgniter.
Visual Studio for C++ and C# development. Eclipse for Java based applications. MySQL Workbench for database management and JIRA, Slack, Git and Trello for Agile Project Management.
Experience using statistical computer languages such as Python (Scikit-learn, Pandas), SQL and Ruby to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets.
Developed numerous games in Unity, Unreal, GameMaker, libGDX and lwjgl. Read and utilized Game Engine Architecture by Jason Gregory and developed a light weight game engine from scratch.

Utilized Git, Heroku, Travis CI, Jenkins, Circle CI, AWS and Firebase for most of my development stack while applying my knowledge of Fullstack Development, Linux Fundamentals and the Software Development Life Cycle.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Portfolio website developed in JavaScript using React. Developed to display my skills and projects, every project developed can be found on this website or my github.
